verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> you are very <S%H3966><s%> great. <S%H1431><s%> You are clothed <S%H3847><s%> with honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty. <S%H1926><s%>
He covers <S%H5844><s%> himself with light <S%H216><s%> as with a garment. <S%H8008><s%> He stretches out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> like a curtain. <S%H3407><s%>

He lays the beams <S%H7136><s%> of his rooms <S%H5944><s%> in the waters. <S%H4325><s%> He makes <S%H7760><s%> the clouds <S%H5645><s%> his chariot. <S%H7398><s%> He walks <S%H1980><s%> on the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind. <S%H7307><s%>
He makes <S%H6213><s%> his messengers <S%H4397><s%> winds; <S%H7307><s%> his servants <S%H8334><s%> flames <S%H3857><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
He laid <S%H3245><s%> the foundations <S%H4349><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that it should not be moved <S%H4131><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
You covered <S%H3680><s%> it with the deep <S%H8415><s%> as with a cloak. <S%H3830><s%> The waters <S%H4325><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> above the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
At <S%H4480><s%> your rebuke <S%H1606><s%> they fled. <S%H5127><s%> At the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your thunder <S%H7482><s%> they hurried away. <S%H2648><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> rose, <S%H5927><s%> the valleys <S%H1237><s%> sank down, <S%H3381><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H2088><s%> you had assigned to them. <S%H3245><s%>
You have set <S%H7760><s%> a boundary <S%H1366><s%> that they may not pass over; <S%H5674><s%> that they don't <S%H7725><s%> turn again to cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He sends <S%H7971><s%> forth springs <S%H4599><s%> into the valleys. <S%H5158><s%> They run <S%H1980><s%> among the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
They give drink <S%H8248><s%> to every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%> The wild donkeys <S%H6501><s%> quench <S%H7665><s%> their thirst. <S%H6772><s%>
The birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky <S%H8064><s%> nest <S%H7931><s%> by them. <S%H5414><s%> They sing among <S%H996><s%> the branches. <S%H6073><s%>
He waters <S%H8248><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> from his rooms. <S%H5944><s%> The earth <S%H776><s%> is filled <S%H7646><s%> with the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your works. <S%H4639><s%>

He causes the grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> for the livestock, <S%H929><s%> and plants <S%H6212><s%> for man <S%H120><s%> to cultivate, <S%H3318><s%> that he may bring forth food <S%H3899><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

wine <S%H3196><s%> that makes glad <S%H8055><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of man, <S%H582><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> to make his face <S%H6440><s%> to shine, <S%H6670><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> that strengthens <S%H5582><s%> man <S%H582><s%>'s heart. <S%H3824><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s trees <S%H6086><s%> are well watered, <S%H7646><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> which he has planted; <S%H5193><s%>
where the birds <S%H6833><s%> make their nests. <S%H7077><s%> The stork <S%H2624><s%> makes its home <S%H1004><s%> in the fir trees. <S%H1265><s%>
The high <S%H1364><s%> mountains <S%H2022><s%> are for the wild goats. <S%H3277><s%> The rocks <S%H5553><s%> are a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for the rock badgers. <S%H8227><s%>
He appointed <S%H6213><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> for seasons. <S%H4150><s%> The sun <S%H8121><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> when to set. <S%H3996><s%>
You make <S%H7896><s%> darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and it is night, <S%H3915><s%> in which all the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> prowl. <S%H7430><s%>
The young lions <S%H3715><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> after their prey, <S%H2964><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> their food <S%H400><s%> from God. <S%H410><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> rises, <S%H2224><s%> and they steal away, <S%H622><s%> and lay down <S%H7257><s%> in their dens. <S%H4585><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> goes forth <S%H3318><s%> to his work, <S%H6467><s%> to his labor <S%H5656><s%> until the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> how many <S%H7231><s%> are your works! <S%H4639><s%> In wisdom <S%H2451><s%> have you made <S%H6213><s%> them all. <S%H776><s%> The earth is full <S%H4390><s%> of your riches. <S%H7075><s%>

There is the sea, <S%H3220><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and wide, <S%H7342><s%> in which are innumerable <S%H4557><s%> living <S%H7431><s%> things, <S%H6996><s%> both small and large <S%H1419><s%> animals. <S%H2416><s%>
There the ships <S%H591><s%> go, <S%H1980><s%> and leviathan, <S%H3882><s%> whom you formed <S%H3335><s%> to play there. <S%H7832><s%>
These all wait <S%H7663><s%> for you, <S%H5414><s%> that you may give them their food <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
You give <S%H5414><s%> to them; <S%H3950><s%> they gather. You open <S%H6605><s%> your hand; <S%H3027><s%> they are satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with good. <S%H2896><s%>

You hide <S%H5641><s%> your face: <S%H6440><s%> they are troubled; <S%H926><s%> you take away <S%H622><s%> their breath: <S%H7307><s%> they die, <S%H1478><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
You send <S%H7971><s%> forth your Spirit: <S%H7307><s%> they are created. <S%H1254><s%> You renew <S%H2318><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground. <S%H127><s%>
Let the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> endure forever. <S%H5769><s%> Let Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his works. <S%H4639><s%>
He looks <S%H5027><s%> at the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it trembles. <S%H7460><s%> He touches <S%H5060><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and they smoke. <S%H6225><s%>
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> as long as I live. <S%H2416><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to my God <S%H430><s%> while I have any being. <S%H5750><s%>
Let your meditation <S%H7879><s%> be sweet <S%H6149><s%> to him. <S%H8055><s%> I will rejoice in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Let sinners <S%H2400><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of the earth. <S%H776><s%> Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be no more. <S%H1288><s%> Bless Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Yah! <S%H3068><s%>
